name: Bandits
overview: Your job is to guard the supplies at the lunar base. Bandits of various sorts arrive in waves and descend, trying to get the goods. Armed with a mobile laser gun and some shielding, you score points by blasting the bandits. Bandits has 28 levels of play. You begin with 5 ships and acquire a bonus ship for every 5,000 points. The game is similar to Stratovox. It also bares some resemblance to the arcade game Rip Off.
